Uses of Interface
com.okta.sdk.http.HttpRequestBuilder

  • Packages that use HttpRequestBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.okta.sdk.http
    HTTP Request API for SDK users that do not depend on the HttpServletRequest API.

    • Uses of HttpRequestBuilder in com.okta.sdk.http

      Methods in com.okta.sdk.http that return HttpRequestBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HttpRequestBuilder HttpRequestBuilder.addHeader(String name, String[] value)
      Deprecated. 
      Adds a request header that will be part of the headers map in the resulting request instance.
      HttpRequestBuilder HttpRequestBuilder.addParameter(String name, String[] value)
      Deprecated. 
      Adds a request parameter that will be part of the parameters map in the resulting request instance.
      HttpRequestBuilder HttpRequestBuilder.headers(Map<String,String[]> headers)
      Deprecated. 
      Sets the HTTP Headers that will be present in the resulting request instance.
      static HttpRequestBuilder HttpRequests.method(HttpMethod method)
      Deprecated. 
      Creates and returns a new HttpRequestBuilder that builds request instances that will be used for request authentication.
      HttpRequestBuilder HttpRequestBuilder.parameters(Map<String,String[]> parameters)
      Deprecated. 
      Sets the request parameters that will be present in the resulting request instance.
      HttpRequestBuilder HttpRequestBuilder.queryParameters(String queryParameters)
      Deprecated. 
      Sets the query parameters that will be present in the resulting request instance.
